Package ui

package ui
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Board
    Util.Board.java Creates a grid of slots
    ButtonBuilder
    ButtonBuilder.java Abstract class for making the blueprint of a button
    Circle
    Circle.java creates the checkers for player1 (red) and player2 (blue)
    HelpButton
    HelpButton.java Extends ButtonBuilder.java Creates a button that upon click, shows a dialog that explains expected inputs
    Input
    HelpButton.java Extends TextAreaBuilder.java Implements an input interface using textarea
    InputButton
    InputButton.java Extends ButtonBuilder.java Creates a button that manages Input.java
    MenuNodes
    MenuNodes.java Contains the GUI nodes for the starting menu
    Output
    Output.java Extends TextAreaBuilder.java Implements an output interface that shows text using textarea
    RestartButton
    RestartButton.java Extends ButtonBuilder.java Creates a button that restarts the game
    Slot
    Slot.java creates a slot that can have a checker inside
    TextAreaBuilder
    TextAreaBuilder.java Abstract class for making the blueprint of a textarea
    TextBuilder
    TextBuilder.java Makes text
